originalText.text: This school is exceptional! The experience was great, my teacher was attentive to myself and all of my classmates needs. The information they teach not only advocates proper form and functional workouts, but shows you how to meet the needs of your clientele, manage your routines, and teaches you the science of health and fitness. The setting of the classes are wonderful as well, everyone in and out of the school was so interactive and supportive. I would do this class 100 times over just for the experience of it all.

originalText.text: Teachers and staff at AAPT are nothing, but helpful in every way possible. The education which included classroom and hands on experience was amazing. Best of all everything done at the school prepares you for the personal training industry. Great choice.

text.text: Teachers and staff at AAPT are nothing, but helpful in every way possible. The education which included classroom and hands on experience was amazing. Best of all everything done at the school prepares you for the personal training industry. Great choice.

originalText.text: The material you learn at the school is very Knowledgeable for starting you fitness career on the right path. Very informative and hands on. This was a great learning experience for me. You can come in knowing the smallest amount of fitness and leave ready to hired as a personal trainer in the top gyms. They also offer a career fair where you meet with all kinds of gyms and see what's out there for you!!! BEST OF LUCK!

originalText.text:
The American Academy of Personal Training sets the new standards in the personal training industry. With its 300 hours of both theory and practice, it provides the necessary tools for any health enthusiast or soon to be professional that wants to start their personal training career. With an AAPT PT Cert, any online certification will become accessory.

Tripling the course’s cost it would still be worth it, and aside from that, prospect students who qualify, may receive financial aid.

I really enjoyed my classes with both of my instructors. Very knowledgeable and always available to answer your inquiries. A shout out to both Norberto Quiles and Todd Smith I had a blast with you guys.

The American Academy of Personal Training sets the new standards in the personal training industry. With its 300 hours of both theory and practice, it provides the necessary tools for any health enthusiast or soon to be professional that wants to start their personal training career. With an AAPT PT Cert, any online certification will become accessory.

Tripling the course’s cost it would still be worth it, and aside from that, prospect students who qualify, may receive financial aid.

I really enjoyed my classes with both of my instructors. Very knowledgeable and always available to answer your inquiries. A shout out to both Norberto Quiles and Todd Smith I had a blast with you guys.

originalText.text: The school is amazing and taught me a great deal. Switching careers from telesales to personal training is challenging, but the course definitely got me ready and up to speed. Now, I currently have a job at Equinox. I got the job through a recruiter who I met at a Job Fair at AAPT.
